.rules            Shows rules for the AjaxPvP Network

```
Please mention one user in order to kick them!
!Kick [@user] [reason]
```

actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
AjaxPvP Official Rules
Rules
Don't be toxic - Be nice, don't cause drama.
឵឵ ឵឵
• Don't post links to inappropriate pictures, videos, or websites - This includes but not limited to NSFW, Jump Scare, or Screamer links within any channel.
឵឵ ឵឵
• Don’t use voice modifiers while in Discord.
឵឵ ឵឵
• Don’t use any soundboards in Discord.
឵឵ ឵឵
• Don’t impersonate staff - This is something we take seriously.
឵឵ ឵឵
• No spamming in text channels - This includes copypasta and large paragraphs. 
឵឵ ឵឵
• No Racism/Sexism/Homophobia of any kind is tolerated.
឵឵ ឵឵
• No NSFW - This will result in a ban. (This includes through DM's also)
឵឵ ឵឵
• No Doxxing - Do not share, or ask for, the personal information of anyone inside/outside of the community. 
឵឵ ឵឵
• No DDoS threats - Do not send DDoS threats, or engage in DDoS comedy, even if it's a joke.
឵឵ ឵឵
• No Advertising - Please do not advertise servers or other discords - This includes DMs.
឵឵ ឵឵
• Don't sell accounts - This is not the place to advertise or sell accounts.
឵឵ ឵឵
• Memes/Images - Use #memes to post all your memes, we don't need to see them in #general.
឵឵ ឵឵
• Do NOT make others break rules, you'll receive the same punishment.
឵឵ ឵឵
• Do not tag staff members.

Breaking any of these rules will result an immediate ban from the Discord serve
actions.name: Send Message
